effect.Name: Subtraction With Floating Modulus
effect.description: Subtraction With Floating Modulus - Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by floating modulus
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Subtraction With Floating Modulus (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by floating modulus

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable determines the color of the subtractor. When the option is off, the subtractor is the base colors, and when the option is on, the subtractor is the blend colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility

parameter.name: Denom
parameter.description: This variable is the color divisor
